Easy to install, 115 Volt model
Harvest Assist technology clears ice off the freezing surface for fast, consistent ice production

description:

Produces up to 527 LB of Full Cube Ice / 24 hours
Cuber Head is just over 22" wide
Combines a stainless steel interior and exterior with fingerprint-proof plastic side panels for durability
Water-cooled Self-contained Condenser

Classic, full-sized cubes are the most common cube type

Water-cooled units maximize space usage with no side air vent clearance needed
Water-cooled condenser means no hot air vented into surroundings

Everpure EV9327-73 INSURICE Triple PF-7FC-S Ice Filtration System
description:
Details

Everpure Insurice Triple PF-7FC-S System Balanced cartridge for optimum performance in varying water qualities. Pre-Filter cartridge. Increased capacity for extended reduction of chemical and mechanical contaminants. Reduces ice machine problems caused by scale build up from dirt and dissolved minerals.

Description

As tested by Everpure
Balanced cartridge for optimum performance in varying water qualities
Increased capacity for extended reduction of chemical and mechanical contaminants
Reduces ice machine problems caused by scale build up from dirt and dissolved minerals*
Integrated beaded phosphate with levels specifically selected for greater life and scale inhibition
Reduces maintenance and service costs by reducing scale* and clogging of distribution lines, evaporator plate and pumps
Reduces chlorine taste and odor and other offensive contaminants
New Fibredyne™ II media inhibits the growth of bacteria
Fibredyne submicron carbon block technology reduces dirt and particles as small as 1/2 micron in size and reduces health contaminants such as cysts
20" prefilter reduces dirt and particles
Manifold features water shut-off, flushing valve and outlet pressure gauge
Sanitary cartridge replacement is simple, quick and clean. Internal filter parts are never exposed to handling or contamination
NSF Certified under NSF/ANSI Standards 42 and 53


 Note:  The contaminants or other substances removed or reduced by this drinking water system are not necessarily in your water. Do not use with water that is microbiologically unsafe or of unknown quality without adequate disinfection before or after the system. Systems certified water that may contain filterable cysts.



 Note:  No Electrical Connection Required


Features


Cyst Reduction
Chloramine Reduction
Taste and Odor
Bacteriostatic
Scale Control
Turbidity Reduction


Specs 

Capacity: 75,000 gallons
Maximum Flow: 7.5 gpm
Working Pressure: 10 - 125 psi (0.7 – 8.6 bar), non-shock

Everpure EV4339-31 3/8" BSP Claris Flow Meter US
description:
Details
The CLARIS Flow Sensor has been developed specifically to moniter the usage rate of the CLARIS water filter system to determine the optimum cartridge replacement interval. After setting the programming unit to moniter the specific filter size, the Claris Flow Sensor continually measures the filtrate colume to calculate and display the remaining filtration capacity in litres. Once the available filtration capacity is exhausted or the maximum operation time has been reached, the display unit indicated thefilter cartridge replacement. The programming and display unit provides the following information

Residual capacity of installed filter cartridge
Filtrate colume of the last five installed filter cartridges
Operation time of the last five installed filter cartridges
Total filtrate volume since Flow Sensor installation

SENSOR UNIT

Connection: In 3/8“ BSP F nut / out 3/8“ BSP M
Operating Pressure: 2 - 8 bar (29 - 116 PSI)
Flow Rate: 10 - 100 (.04 - .44 gpm)
Pressure loss (up to 100l/h flow rate) [bar]: 0,2 (3 PSI)
Precision (horizontal installation): [%] +/-5
Water Temperature (min/max): 39 - 86 °F (+4 - +30 °C)
Ambient Temperature (min/max): 39 - 104 °F (+4 - +40 °C)
Dimensions (BxHxT): 3.15" x 1.81" x 1.69" (80 x 46 x 43 mm
Installation position: Horizontal recommended

Delivers premium quality water for ice applications.

Everpure EV9970-07 MRS-100 Reverse Osmosis System
description:
Details

MRS-100 Mineral Reduction System. 100 gallon per day capacity at 77F, mineral reduction cartridge (Reverse Osmosis Module), plate mount design, for multiple steamers, small to mid-size coffee, espresso machines

Description

Configurable system that delivers reverse osmosis or blended water for multiple foodservice applications
Improves equipment life and performance by removing at least 90%+ of all dissolved solids that cause scale build-up
Gaurds against taste and odor causing contaminants while removing dirt particulates and dissolved minerals can adversely affect taste of water and beverages
Sanitary cartridge replacement is simple, quick and clean. Internal filter parts are never exposed to handling or contamination
Wall mount design allows flexible installation
Reduces limescale build-up that can cause excessive machine downtime and increased maintenance costs. Plus scale reduction reduces energy costs
"CC" models introduce a small amount of hardness minerals back in to the treated water. This controlled remineralization is desirable for coffee and other applications that require some hardness to achieve optimum results.


The Contaminants or other substances removed or reduced by this system are not necessarily in your water. Do not use with water that is microbiologically unsafe or of unknown quality without adequate disinfection before or after the system


 NOTE: System shown with option Pre-filter kit

Asbestos Reduction
Chlorine Reduction
Cyst Reduction
Iron Reduction
Particulate Reduction
Reduction
Reverse Osmosis
Scale Control
Taste & Odor
Turbidity Reduction

Max. Temp:100°F
Inlet Outlet Size: 3/8"
H: 30" W: 15" D: 8"

Everpure EV9970-20 MRS-350BL Reverse Osmosis System
description:
Details

MRS-350BL Mineral Reduction System, 350 gallon per day capacity at 77F, mineral reduction cartridge (Reverse Osmosis Module), plate mount design, for kitchen use

Description

Configurable system that delivers reverse osmosis or blended water for multiple foodservice applications
The BL Series features an adjustable blend valve, which allows custom tailoring of the dissolved mineral content in the treated water. With this feature, a controlled amount of raw water is mixed with the Reserve Osmosis water to create a blend containing the desired level of TDS (Total Dissloved Solids). After blending, the water passes through a sub-micron carbon filter. This fnal filtration step removed tastes and odors, and insures delivery of ingredient quality water.
Reduces chlorine taste and odor and other offensive contaminants that can adversely affect taste of water and beverages
Sanitary cartridge replacement is simple, quick and clean. Internal filter parts are never exposed to handling or contamination
Wall mount design allows flexible installation
Reduces limescale build-up that can cause excessive machine downtime and increased maintenance costs. Plus, scale reduction reduces energy costs.


 Note:  Electrical Connection Required; 115 Volts AC, 60 Hertz, 1 Phase


The Contaminants or other substances removed or reduced by this system are not necessarily in your water. Do not use with water that is microbiologically unsafe or of unknown quality without adequate disinfection before or after the system.

Everpure EV9970-42 Triple-MC Replacement Cartridge Kit
description:
Details

Everpure EV9970-42 Triple-MC Replacement Cartridge Kit EV9970-42 Everpure EV9970-42 Triple-MC Replacement Cartridge Kit Features: The Everpure EV9970-42 Triple-MC Replacement Cartridge Kit is a convenient kit that features all necessary cartridges to service a High Flow CSR Triple combination system. This kit includes: Qty. 1 - EC210 Sediment Prefilter Qty. 3 - MC(2) Filter Cartridge Qty. 1 - SS-IMF ScaleStick (8") or SS-10 Scalestick (10") Everpure EV9970-42 Triple-MC Replacement Cartridge Kit Specifications EV9970-42 EV9970-40

Description

Replacement cartridge kit for Everpure High Flow CSR Triple-MC2 Systems
Convenient replacement cartridge kit contains all necessary cartridges to service filters in specific High Flow CSR Triple combination systems
Kit includes (1) EC210 prefilter, (3) MC2 filter cartridges, and (1) SS-IMF with spacer
Reduces chlorine taste and odor and other offensive contaminants that can adversely affect the taste of beverages
New and improved Micro-Pure II media with AgION antimicrobial protection inhibits any potential bacterial growth
Precoat submicron technology reduces dirt and particles as small as 1/2 micron in size and reduces possible health contaminants such as asbestos fibers and Cryptosporidium and Giardia cysts
20" prefilter cartridge captures larger dirt particles and extends the life of the MC2 cartridges
SS-IMF cartridge inhibits limescale build-up in ice machines and coffee brewers as tested by Everpure
MC2 cartridge are NSF Certified under NSF/ANSI Standards 42 and 53. SS-IMF cartridge is NSF component listed


 Note:  The Contaminants or other substances removed or reduced by this system are not necessarily in your water. Do not use with water that is microbiologically unsafe or of unknown quality without adequate disinfection before or after the system. System certified for cyst reduction may be used with disinfected water that may contain filterable cysts.

Features

Bacteriostatic
Cyst Reduction
Particulate Reduction

Specs 

Maximum Flow: 6.7 gpm (25.4 Lpm)
Max. Temp:35 - 100°F
Working Pressure: 10 psi - 125 psi, non-shock
H: 20" W: 4" D: 4"

title: Everpure EV9970-42 Triple-MC Replacement Cartridge Kit
Everpure EV9970-54 MRS-600HE-II High Efficiency Reverse Osmosis System
description:
Details

Everpure EV9970-54 MRS-600HE-II High Efficiency Reverse Osmosis System

Description

High Output/High Efficiency configurable system that delivers reverse osmosis or blended filtered water for multiple foodservice applications
The tailored blending process removes just the right amount of dissolved solids from the incoming tap water to achieve the desired final water quality
High Recovery reverse osmosis technology yields significant savings in water and sewer charges with a minimal enviromental footprint
With the average recovery of 78%, the MRS-600HE-II System only disposes approximately 1/4 cup of water for each cup of water dispensed
Requires less than 50% of the electrical energy typically consumed by conventional reverse osmosis systems
System operation is tailored to the water quality at each location to maximize recovery
Reduces limescale build-up that can cause excessive machine downtime and increased maintenance costs
Reduces chlorine taste and odor and other contaminants that can adversely affect the taste of water and beverages


 Note:  Electrical Connection Required; 120 Volts AC, 50-60 Hertz, NEMA 5-15 Phase


 Note:  The Contaminants or other substances removed or reduced by this system are not necessarily in your water. Do not use with water that is microbiologically unsafe or of unknown quality without adequate disinfection before or after the system. System certified for cyst reduction may be used with disinfected water that may contain filterable cysts.

Features

Bacteriostatic
Cyst Reduction
Particulate Reduction

Specs 

Working Pressure: 25-80 psi, non-shock
H: 33" W: 23" D: 13"

Everpure EV9970-38 MRS-600 High Efficiency Reverse Osmosis System
description:
Details

MRS-600 HE Reverse Osmosis System, for coffee brewers, espresso machines, steamers, combi-ovens and ice, average recovery 78%, 600 gallon per day production, 25-80 psi (1.72-5.52 bar) pressure requirement, 1.5 gpm minimum water supply, 40-100F inlet temperature, 115v/60/1-ph, NEMA 5-15P

Description

High output/high efficiency configurable system that delivers reverse osmosis and blended filtered water for multiple foodservice applications
The tailored blending process removes just the right amount of dissolved solids from the incoming tap water to achieve the desired final water quality
High recovery reverse osmosis technology yields significant savings in water and sewer charges with minimal enviroment footprint
With the average recovery of 78%, the MRS-600 HE system only disposes approximately 1/4 cup of water for each cup of coffee brewed
Requires less than 50% of the electrical energy typically consumed by conventional reverse osmosis systems
System operation is tailored to the water quality at each location to maximize recovery possible for a specified membrane lifetime
Reduces limescale build-up that can cause excessive machine downtime and increased maintenance costs
Reduces chlorine taste and odor and other contaminants that can adversely affect the taste of water and beverages


 Note:  Electrical Connection Required; 115 Volts AC, 60 Hertz, 1 Phase


The Contaminants or other substances removed or reduced by this system are not necessarily in your water. Do not use with water that is microbiologically unsafe or of unknown quality without adequate disinfection before or after the system.

Features

Asbestos Reduction
Chlorine Reduction
Cyst Reduction
Iron Reduction
Particulate Reduction
Reduction
Reverse Osmosis
Scale Control
Taste & Odor
Turbidity Reduction

Specs 

Capacity: 600 gallons
Max. Temp:40 - 100°F
Inlet/Outlet Size: 3/8" OD tube connection
H: 32" W: 23" D: 13.6"

title: Everpure EV9970-38 MRS-600 High Efficiency Reverse Osmosis System

Ice-O-Matic ICE0856GA Air-Cooled 875 LB Grande Cube Ice Machine
description:
Ice-O-Matic ICE0856GA Features

ICE Series Ice Maker
Produces up to 875 LB Grande Cube Ice / 24 hours
Air-Cooled Condenser
30" Wide, 26" High cabinet design
Incorporates a stainless steel interior and exterior, along with fingerprint-proof plastic exterior panels
208-230v/60Hz/1-ph, 14.2 amps


Ice-O-Matic ICE0856GA Ice Style

NEW, LARGE sized, GRANDE cubes
Grande Cube measures 1-1/4" x 1-1/8" x 7/8"
Large Cube is great for restaurant, bar and nightclub drinks and for retail bagging applications


Benefits of Ice-O-Matic ICE0856GA

Growth of bacteria and slime fungus is reduced due to the AgIon built-in antimicrobial protection
Long-term damaging effects of water and ice on the evaporator plate are prevented due to the electroless nickel plating
Harvest Assist technology clears ice off the freezing surface for fast, consistent ice production

ITV SPIKA NG125-A1H Air-Cooled 143 LB Half Dice Cube Undercounter Ice Maker
description:
ITV SPIKA NG125-A1H Features

Undercounter Ice Maker
Produces up to 143 LB of half dice cube ice every 24 hours
Integrated Storage Bin capacity up to 44 LB of ice
Self-contained, Air-cooled condenser
304 Stainless Steel Box-Frame Construction
21.13" wide
31.25" high
Uses R404a refrigerant
115 Volt/60Hz/1-Phase electrical
Electromechanical timer and thermostat
External mounted on/off switch
Seal-less pump outside ice zone
ENERGY STAR Qualified unit


ITV SPIKA NG125-A1H Ice Style

Half Dice cube ice cools beverages quickly due to its high surface area to volume ratio
Half Dice cube ice measurements: 1" x 1/2" x 1"
Ideal for beverage and dispensing applications


ITV SPIKA NG125-A1H Benefits

Plug-and-play installation with NEMA Plug Type 5-15P
Uses only 1.8 gallons of water per hour for ice production
Water Distributor increases resistance to scale buildup - removable for cleaning
Removable top cover gives user quick access to ice/wash switch and electrical box
Designed for easy access to machine internals for service
Front ventilation permits built-in installation
Legs adjustable between 6" and 6.5"
Integrated Ice Storage Bin - insulated (non-refrigerated) with polyurethane foam for lower heat transmission


ITV SPIKA NG125-A1H Certifications

Ice-O-Matic BPF-1 - Bin Top Kit for 30" Ice Maker on a B110 Ice Bin
description:
This Bin Top Filler Kit is designed to be used with a 30 inch wide ice maker head sitting on top of the 48" wide Ice-O-Matic B110PS Ice Bin. The kit consists of two heavy duty plastic panels, two front gasket strips and bin straps. Plastic panels have a blow-molded design for a snug, secure fit on top of the bin openings for proper insulation. Panels are easily removed in order to clean the bin.
Features

Bin Top Filler Kit
Heavy duty plastic construction
Designed for use with a 30" wide ice maker on the 48" wide B110 Ice Bin
Easily removed for bin cleaning
NSF approved
Note: This adapter kit can ONLY be used with the B110PS Ice Bin and a 30" wide ice maker. To place a 30" wide ice maker on an existing Ice-O-Matic B100PS bin, you must use Adapter Kit KBT5.

Ice-O-Matic IFQ1-XL Single Combination Water Filter Cartridge Assembly System
description:
Ice-O-Matic IFQ1-XL - Single Filter Manifold Water Filter System protects your ice maker. This water filtration system reduces scale formation, removes sediment down to 1/2 micron and keeps ice pure, odorless and tasteless. The IFQ1-XL manifold system mounts to the wall to take up minimal space. Comes with quick-connect fittings for fast easy replacement.

Ice-O-Matic IFQ1-XL Features

Single-cartridge manifold water filter system
IsoNet scale inhibitor helps remove and prevent scale build up in ice makers
Activated Carbon removes bad tastes and odors
Removes sediment from water
Manifold Filter system mounts to wall to minimize installation space required
Compatible with all Ice-O-Matic ice machines with 850 to 1050 LB ice production levels
0.5 micron particle reduction rating
2.25 GPM Maximum flow rate
125 PSI maximum pressure
Maximum water temperature: 100 Degrees Fahrenheit
Should be changed every 180 day (6 months) at minimum


Ice-O-Matic IFQ1-XL Benefits

NSF certified

Overall Dimensions: Height: 21" Width: 6" Depth: 4"

title: Ice-O-Matic IFQ1-XL Single Combination Water Filter Cartridge Assembly System
Ice-O-Matic IOMASI O3-Matic Ozone Delivery System for Ice Maker Water Sanitization
description:
Ice-O-Matic IOMASI - O3-Matic Ozone Delivery System Assembly is an antimicrobial ice protection device that uses synthetic diamond-based electrolytic technology to produce a small, safe, and precise amount of dissolved ozone from the existing oxygen in the ice maker's water supply. A small amount of the ozone is frozen into the outer layer of each ice cube. As the ice slowly melts, the ozone is freed and released into the bin. The ozone sanitizes and retards microbial growth in the ice bin and other utensils that contact ice, such as an ice scoop. The system is effective against mold, mildew, bacteria and viruses.

Ice-O-Matic IOMASI Features

O3-matic unit uses electrolytic technology to produce safe ozone in water
Designed for use only with Cuber Style Ice Machines
Ozone is frozen into outer layer of ice cubes
Ozone rapidly reacts to bacteria, viruses, protozoans
Manifold Filter system mounts to wall to minimize installation space required
Only connect O3-Matic system to ONE ice machine
1.3 GPM Maximum flow rate
125 PSI maximum pressure, minimum 20 PSI
Incoming Water temperature: 40 - 86 Degrees Fahrenheit
Accepts 3/8" OD beverage-grade tubing - with push/pull fitting
Should be supplied by water from water filter or RO system
NOT for use with Flaker, nugget or any other style ice machine
Do not connect to beverage dispenser / water dispenser water lines
Device must be installed upright (with LED Lights face up)
Comes with plug and cord with integrated 24V, 1.25a transformer
Uses 120 Volts, (100-240V, 50/60Hz electrical connection required)
LED indicator lights indicate system function and alert you for cartridge replacement


Ice-O-Matic IOMASI Benefits

Increases time required between bin sanitizing
Ozone has a greater disinfection effectiveness than chlorination
Ozone effective over a wide pH range
Strong oxidizing power with short reaction time
Ozone sanitizing does not add chemicals to the water
NSF certified

Overall Dimensions: Height: 8" Width: 3.8" Depth: 3.6"

title: Scotsman CU50GA-1A 14 7/8" Air Cooled Undercounter Full Size Cube Ice Machine - 65 lb.
Ice-O-Matic GEMU090 85 LB Pearl Ice Undercounter Ice Machine
description:
Ice-O-Matic's GEMU090 is one of the most popular under counter ice machines available from Ice-O-Matic (GEMU090). The Ice-O-Matic GEMU090 creates nugget ice (called Pearl Ice by Ice-O-Matic) and can be used as both a commercial and a residential ice machine. Its stainless steel finish provides a high-quality aesthetic that complements other restaurant equipment and many modern home appliances. The Ice-O-Matic GEMU090 can create up to 85 pounds of Pearl Ice every 24 hours (at 70 degrees Fahrenheit air and 50 degrees Fahrenheit water), and its self-contained bin stores up to 22 pounds of ice at a time. The Ice-O-Matic GEMU090 is a mere 14.88 inches wide and only 33.4 inches tall, allowing you to install the unit in nearly any location, including under most standard counters. The Ice-O-Matic GEMU090's quiet operation also makes this ice machine desirable, since it will not disrupt the ambiance of the room in which it resides. This Ice-O-Matic ice machine has drawn comparisons to Scotsman's popular, discontinued NU130. They both produce nugget ice, are identical in size, shape, and are almost identical in terms of ice output. The increasingly sought-after Ice-O-Matic GEMU090 makes a viable alternative to Scotsman's NU130. The Ice-O-Matic GEMU090 operates simply, with basic hookups at installation, requiring only a 115 volt outlet, and a suitable water connection to create the Pearl Ice everyone loves. Note that the manufacturer recommends water filtration on the incoming water line for the best quality ice. The Ice-O-Matic GEMU090 also requires a drain for the water purged during ice production. An optional drain pump can be purchased and hooked up during installation for locations without a floor drain.
Click Herefor more information regarding the Ice-O-Matic GEMU090(Link will open in a new window)

title: Ice-O-Matic GEMU090 85 LB Pearl Ice Undercounter Ice Machine
